author: 113luisaw
title: Hilton Garden Inn Tribeca
text: Great place to see Tribeca from! I would recommend this to others!!! The hotel staff was courteous and very accomodating. Valet parking was great - we pulled right up to the front of the hotel and were able to quickly offload and check in (Bear in mind, this is NYC). The room was just right for our needs - business trip - and I also appreciated that the bar-fridge was working so I could store my insulin.
